title: Physicians' Perspectives on FDA Approval Standards and Off-label Drug Marketing.
abstract: This nationwide survey of US primary care internists and medical specialists evaluates physicians’ attitudes about the US Food and Drug Administration’s drug approval standards and off-label drug marketing.
